abstract: A-list celebrities and models gather at Saatchi Gallery for opening of Mademoiselle Prive, new exhibition from Chanel celebrating craftsmanship and heritage of French luxury house and its founder Coco Chanel.
lead_paragraph: A star-studded group gathered at Saatchi Gallery for the opening of “Mademoiselle Privé,” the new exhibition from Chanel.

headline.main: In London, Stella Tennant, Lily-Rose Depp and Others Celebrate Chanel

snippet: A star-studded group gathered at Saatchi Gallery for the opening of “Mademoiselle Privé,” the new exhibition from Chanel.
